normalized: gosha academy.
the students had already gone home.
only a few teachers remained.
signs of life had disappeared from the school building.
the figure of muroi was in the infirmary.
muroi was looking at sawaki kousuke's records.
a slight smile was suspended on his face.

name: muroi
normalized: what do you want?
muroi suddenly addressed someone while writing something in the records.
nobody else was in the infirmary.
naturally, there was no kind of response.

name: muroi
normalized: dear, dear…
muroi breathed out a light sigh, stopped his pen and stood up.

name: muroi
normalized: i'm talking to you, kiryuu-sensei.
he turned around as he said so.
towards a space where there wasn't anyone.
and then――
that empty space softly swayed.
the figure of a man appeared from there.
it was kiryuu.

name: muroi
normalized: is that optical camouflage, the ability that some oni and mazoku (demonic beings) are said to use?
that's splendid for a human.
muroi said, expressing a faint smile without moving an eyebrow.

name: kiryuu
normalized: for a while, i was working alongside a demon woman named ingrid.
i studied it and made it my own.
kiryuu shrugged arrogantly.

name: muroi
normalized: it's marvellous.
muroi praised kiryuu.
however, perhaps having disliked his indifferent tone of voice, kiryuu answered back in a somewhat stronger tone.

name: kiryuu
normalized: this is my turf.

name: muroi
normalized: that's impetuous, isn't it?
muroi shrugged his shoulders a little, and placed both hands in his pockets.

name: muroi
normalized: so, when did you realize?
it should be perfect camouflage that even the taimanin don't know about.
when muroi said so, kiryuu raised his glasses with his fingers and answered boastfully.

name: kiryuu
normalized: no matter how much you try to hide, i can't forget your stench.
i have a special “nose” for who's where, and so on.

name: muroi
normalized: ah, that's true, now that you mention it.

name: kiryuu
normalized: however, in your case, it's at a level where it's only just clear by approaching you.
i guess it was never noticed by the taimanin, because of me.

name: muroi
normalized: i'm impressed.
it's good to have my unworthy student around.
muroi took out the hands he had just put in his pockets, and clapped them twice.
his face was still smiling.
it was an attitude that clearly looked down on kiryuu.
anger filled kiryuu's voice.

name: kiryuu
normalized: what do you want?
i don't know what you're scheming, but i think you'd better leave, shishou (teacher).

name: muroi
normalized: is that advice for me?

name: kiryuu
normalized: i'm indebted to you for instructing me on hellish medical technology before.
i'll overlook this, so immediately… kuh?!
the appearance of the room changed in an instant.
the whole of the floor, walls and ceiling changed into a bright pink-coloured sarcoma.
the flesh walls, which gave the impression of the membranes inside an organ, surrounded the two, wriggling.
it was quite an evil room, which couldn't help but eat away at a person's mind.

name: kiryuu
normalized: what's this?!
perhaps because he hadn't expected it at all, astonishment arose on kiryuu's face.

name: muroi
normalized: did you think i just snuck in?
muroi's eyes, which were thin as strings, had opened slightly.
an evil light was dancing in there.

name: muroi
normalized: this place is now my domain.
his tone of voice had changed slightly as well.

name: kiryuu
normalized: kuh… to create a hellish barrier in the taimanin village is daring, isn't it…?!
kiryuu looked at his feet in annoyance.
the mucus-covered sarcoma floor was starting to grab onto kiryuu's legs.

name: muroi
normalized: since you're my pupil, you'll know well, won't you?
that i am a genius.
muroi expressed a distinctly evil smile.
this was his true nature.

name: kiryuu
normalized: i've heard you've been creeping around hell for a while, but what are you planning by lending a hand to nomad again?!
kiryuu shouted.
both his legs were already enveloped by the sarcoma up to the knees.

name: muroi
normalized: the realization of an ideal!
there is a problem in this world not understood by anybody but a genius.
muroi turned his harsh eyes to kiryuu, who had become his prisoner.
kiryuu stared back at those eyes, head on.

name: kiryuu
normalized: i'll say one thing.
the only ones who can call themselves geniuses are kiryuu and a certain woman, demonic specialist doctor furst!

name: muroi
normalized: that's the first time i've heard that name in a long while.
now, it will be a pain if you get in the way, so i'll have you die.

name: kiryuu
normalized: d, don't screw around… kuh!
i, i can't move in sarcoma like this!
kiryuu finally seemed like he was trying take a combative posture.
however, the sarcoma gradually rising from the floor was already enveloping kiryuu to about the waist.
now “the room” was about to swallow kiryuu.

name: muroi
normalized: you can't escape.
bye.
muroi slowly raised his right hand.
he turned the palm of his hand toward kiryuu.

name: muroi
normalized: die!
needle-like tentacles rushed out from muroi's body.
those countless tentacles pierced kiryuu, and instantly pulled out.

name: kiryuu
normalized: guguuh?!

name: muroi
normalized: goodbye, apprentice.
“the room” undulated the sarcoma as though it were delighted with its food.
and then, kiryuu, who had become bloodstained due to being skewered, was swallowed up by “the room”, which made unpleasant squishing sounds.

name: kiryuu
normalized: y, you won't get away with this…
kiryuu moaned, having been swallowed up by “the room” to about the neck.

name: muroi
normalized: i am a genius.
regrettably, i can't go to hell, like you.
jubonh!
making a strange sound, kiryuu was completely swallowed up by “the room”.

name: muroi
normalized: i should have taught him overconfidence wasn't good, but…
muroi muttered.
“the room” returned to the original infirmary, as if nothing had happened.

name: muroi
normalized: now, i wonder if i'm going back today?
even muroi's face had returned to the original kind-looking public health doctor.
300 metres underneath tokyo.
in that place was yomihara, the lawless city of darkness.
a vast underground space about five kilometres in length and width.
in that place, which had been bored out of solid bedrock by any means possible, a city no different from the one above had been formed.
it was so tall that a skyscraper could go in snugly, and the ground was completely paved with concrete.
countless vents had been made in the ceiling, and power chords, water pipes, gas pipes and so on were dangling from them and crawling around chaotically.
all those essential utilities were being illegally stolen from aboveground.
buildings were standing in rows in order to tightly cram them into the underground space.
what gathered in those places were the inhabitants of hell, and the dwellers of darkness.
the paradise of evil, yomihara.
it was a shady lawless area where man and demon mingled.
directly at the end of yomihara's northernmost main street was a building called the 「palace of darkness」.
the vertical surface of the bedrock had become exposed, and it was adorned with carved statues made from that bedrock.
the entrance to the mansion, which was made up as if it were a palace, extolled a solemn ambiance not becoming of yomihara.
however, that very 「palace of darkness」 was the japan branch of nomad, headed by the vampire edwin black.
inside it, an arena of darkness in the tradition of the former 「chaos arena」 was established, named the more vicious 「demons' arena」.
thus, there were rumours among the residents of yomihara.
that, in the deepest part of the 「palace of darkness」, there was a gate that led to hell.
right now, edwin black was at exactly the deepest part, the altar.

name: black
normalized: there are no mistakes?
black opened his mouth.

name: oboro
normalized: the preparations are perfect, black-sama.
like her name, she had appeared from the dim (oboro) darkness.
a kunoichi formerly called koukawa.
a woman not once but twice killed by asagi, who had now been revived by black's power again.
an ex-taimanin who had descended into darkness.
oboro.
she smiled bewitchingly.

name: oboro
normalized: reports are coming in from furst, who has infiltrated them.
everything's going well.

name: black
normalized: i think the taimanin have become the greatest obstacle to advancing our control of japan.
the vital point of the taimanin is asagi.

name: oboro
normalized: please leave it to me.
this oboro and furst will definitely drag that pig bitch in front of black-sama's face.
oboro bowed her head respectfully.
but, feeling the presence of another woman behind her, oboro knit her eyebrows.
black-sama…
the one who had shown up, fluttering a burning-red cloak, was black's aide, ingrid.
she―the child of the nobility of hell, which was subject to black's influence―served as an escort who was always loyal to him, and as an excellent secretary.
because she was a user of demonic sword techniques that thoroughly burned the enemies she killed with black flame, she held the alias of hell knight.
ingrid ignored oboro, kneeled before black, and spoke.

name: ingrid
normalized: asagi is a top-notch warrior.
i feel that oboro and furst have a heavy load to bear.
if you were to bestow the order upon me…

name: oboro
normalized: i can't let that pass, ingrid!
oboro sternly scowled at ingrid.
hatred that exceeded fury filled those eyes.
ingrid stood up straight, and looked back at oboro with cold eyes.

name: ingrid
normalized: i merely spoke the truth, oboro.
furst aside, weren't you brought to disgrace by that asagi many times?

name: oboro
normalized: kuh?!

name: ingrid
normalized: furthermore, our objective on this occasion is to capture asagi alive.
that will be a task more difficult than killing her.

name: ingrid
normalized: if you do a bad job, won't you lose the vampire body you received from black-sama?

name: oboro
normalized: is that all you want to say?
oboro's voice was filled with murderous intent.

name: ingrid
normalized: are you going to leave it to anger and challenge me here?

name: oboro
normalized: …kuh.
oboro clenched her fist at ingrid, who turned aside that murderous intent, which was enough to become suffocating, like a cool breeze.

name: black
normalized: hmph.
it seemed this was not the first time.
black slightly smiled at the opposing pair.

name: black
normalized: ingrid.
let her off with that.

name: ingrid
normalized: yes…
being spoken to by black, ingrid obediently withdrew.
she didn't even look at oboro anymore.
however, a smile of derision towards oboro was expressed on her face.

name: black
normalized: oboro.
be sure to bring asagi before me alive.

name: oboro
normalized: definitely…!

name: black
normalized: go.

name: oboro
normalized: right.
oboro finally sent a look of hatred at ingrid again, and suddenly disappeared from that place as if melting into the darkness.
only black and ingrid were left in the area of the altar.

name: ingrid
normalized: black-sama… will you proceed with your plan?
ingrid said anxiously.
her face had changed from loyal secretary to that of a woman.

name: black
normalized: are you opposed to that?
black asked gently, but not to rebuke ingrid.

name: ingrid
normalized: asagi is a dangerous human.
to put that deep within her body would…
saying that much, ingrid suddenly went quiet.
she had become aware of the voice of her heart.

name: ingrid
normalized: （am i jealous of black-sama's obsession with asagi…?
her feelings toward black exceeded the status of his subject.
however, they had to be hidden in the depths of her heart.

name: black
normalized: fufu, what's the matter?
prompted by black, ingrid quietly continued.

name: ingrid
normalized: no… as black-sama wishes.
she bowed her head deeply.

name: black
normalized: the time is near.
black expressed a cold smile.
and then, he changed into a black mist, and disappeared.
only ingrid remained.
